column1: I love the new update! The UI is super clean and fast.
App crashes every time I try to open a playlist. Please fix!
Can we have a sleep timer for podcasts?
Amazing experience, great sound quality and no ads!
The recommendation algorithm is getting worse.
Please add support for more Indian languages.
It's working perfectly on my iPhone, thanks!
Takes too long to load on startup.
Would love to see dark mode in the next update.
Great app, I use it every day!
